mapper.select: select guardian_info.mdn, school_info.school_name, school_info.school_id from school_register inner join student_info on school_register.student_id = student_info.student_id inner join student_guardian_mapping on student_info.student_id = student_guardian_mapping.student_id inner join guardian_info on student_guardian_mapping.mdn = guardian_info.mdn inner join school_info on school_register.school_id =school_info.school_id where school_register.school_year = '2016' order by school_info.school_id asc
